Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Recently , indacenodithiophene ( IDT ) with two thiophene rings held in a rigid arrangement via a central phenyl ring has emerged as a promising donor moiety for D-A polymers due to its good solubility and highly planar structures ( Scheme 1 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| indacenodithiophene (IDT) |

The paragraph mentions only one material entity, which is "indacenodithiophene (IDT)". The entity is described as having two thiophene rings and a central phenyl ring.
